item.title: Smell
item.description: #library - I once wrote something on Facebook, something like, "the delight of getting your sense of smell back after days of being sick; the distress of it happening at the public library."
#library - It's not often I'm screaming "go away! go away! go away!" inside my head while trying to smile and help a patron. The first hour that's all I was doing.

item.title: Husbands and A Death in Door County
item.description: #books - Finished Husbands. Finished A Death in Door County....

#pnw - Yesterday morning we woke up early (or, more correctly, I woke up early and Stacy woke up at her regular time), grabbed some donuts from Depoe Baykery (love the name!), and we went to Depoe Bay to look for some whales....

item.title: Nifty Gigs
item.description: #ope - But, come on, how cool would it be to live in a place where the sun doesn't rise for 66 days in the winter or set for 80 days in the summer....
#www - Snow depth across America. Eternal September. Making a PDF thatâ€™s larger than Germany. How to Read Now by Elaine Castillo. Liquid Television - Complete Series.
#yard - This is what living 150 meters from the Pacific Ocean does to everything you own.

item.title: Smart Quotes
item.description: #huh - Change smart quotes to regular quotes using ctl+shift+'.

item.title: Iceberg A23a
item.description: #huh - The warmer waters north of Antarctica are melting and weakening its vast sides that extend up to 1,312ft (400m)... It once measured 3,900 sq km, but the latest satellite pictures show it is slowly decaying. It is now around 3,500 sq km....
